profileAlternative.name: Julie Knight
profileAlternative.headline: Oracle and SQL Server DBA
profileAlternative.summary: I’m an Oracle Certified Professional that has been working as an Oracle DBA for the last 15 years on both Windows and UNIX platforms. I’ve also been a SQL Server DBA for the last 8 years. I’ve administrated Oracle and SQL Server for several applications that include; PeopleSoft, Maximo, Documentum, SharePoint, ClearQuest, eMatrix, TFS, Titus, and many customized applications.

aboutAlternative.text: I’m an Oracle Certified Professional that has been working as an Oracle DBA for the last 15 years on both Windows and UNIX platforms. I’ve also been a SQL Server DBA for the last 8 years. I’ve administrated Oracle and SQL Server for several applications that include; PeopleSoft, Maximo, Documentum, SharePoint, ClearQuest, eMatrix, TFS, Titus, and many customized applications.

positions.title: DBA Oracle/SQL Server
positions.description:
I work as an Oracle DBA and a SQL Server DBA, with 15 years of experience in Database Administration.
This includes:
Creating and maintaining all databases required for development, testing, and production.
Perform capacity planning required to create and maintain the databases.
Perform ongoing tuning of the database instances.
Install new versions of Oracle and SQL Server and its tools, and any other tools that access the database.
Work all upgrades and patching of Oracle and SQL Server instances and databases.
Plan and implement backup and recovery of the databases.
Perform all configuration control of the instances and databases.
Implement and enforce security for all databases.
Put standards in place to ensure that design and code are produced with proper integrity, security and performance.
Evaluate releases of Oracle and SQL Server and its tools, and third party products to ensure that the site is running the products that are company standard.
Provide technical support to application development teams.
Audit all databases with company specific requirements relating to DFARS.

…
see more

Experienced Product Manager | Analytics | Business Intelligence | Data Management
